issue.title: Service negotiation error
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Running a version negotiation in a physical service edition form leads to a PHP error :  

Notice: Undefined variable: httpHeader in C:\wamp\www\map\administrator\components\com_easysdi_service\helpers\easysdi_service.php on line <i>165

**Fixed versions :** 3.1.3
